metadata.title: CVE-2022-1734 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw in Linux Kernel found in nfcmrvl_nci_unregister_dev() indrivers/nfc/nfcmrvl/main.c can lead to use after free both read or writewhen non synchronized between cleanup routine and firmware downloadroutine.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
